name: Maple Ave
description: The southern terminus of Maple Avenue, where asphalt yields to wilderness. You are at the southern end of Maple Ave. The road turns into a dirt track here, not with a grand vista, but with a whimper, leading into a thick forest that seems to swallow the last vestiges of civilization. Maple Ave continues its weary journey to the north, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
